entry.def: A killing is an act of deliberately killing a person.
If you make a killing, you make a large profit very quickly and easily.

example.ex: They have made a killing on the deal.
example.tran: 他们在这笔交易上赚了大钱。

means.word_mean: 1. an event that causes someone to die
2. the act of terminating a life

Sentence.sentence: The Sudan version was deadly enough, killing 50% of those it infected.
In Pakistan, 1,000women die in honor killings every year.
While holding a burial ceremony for a pet mouse, they were killing pest mice.

sentences.en: No motive for the killing has yet been established.
Investors are set to make a killing from the sell-off.
sentences.cn: 投资者准备清仓以便大赚一笔。

sentences.en: He was clever. He invested a lot of money in property. When prices went up, he made a killing.
sentences.cn: 他很精明，在房地产上大量投资，地价上涨，他赚了一大笔钱。
